article_metadata.news-keywords: renee ellmers, pac, jim duncan, money, campaign, fundraise, primary, election, eagle forum, north carolina
article_metadata.description: A primary challenger looking to upset three-term Republican Rep. Renee Ellmers this year has picked up another endorsement from a group charging the incumbent hasn’t held to conservative principles since her last election.
article_metadata.title: Conservative PACs backing Rep. Renee Ellmers’ chief primary opponent | McClatchy DC
